login.description: Welcome back! Please enter your credentials or sign in with Telegram.

passwordChange.description: Now create a new password. Secure password includes digits, letters and delimiter symbols.

success.description: Ваш пароль успішно змінено. Натисніть нижче, щоби увійти в обліковий запис.

passwordReset.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

success.description: We've sent you a link to reset your password on email {email}
success.retryMessage: Didn't get an email? <resendlink>Click to resend.</resendlink>
